tool_description: The Option Chain Data API is developed by Inter Data Limited to provide real-time Options prices and Stock data for United States listed options. The data is provided in easy to consume JSON format through RESTful API. The data covers all expiration dates of a listed options.
name: Option Chain
title: Option Chain

api_list.name: options
api_list.description: return option chain and stock data

required_parameters.name: ticker
required_parameters.description: A ticker for U.S. Trading Stocks and ETF

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://option-chain.p.rapidapi.com/options/aapl"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "option-chain.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://option-chain.p.rapidapi.com/options/{ticker}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "option-chain.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: straddle
api_list.description: Retrieve options data in straddle format
